title: Quasitriangular chiral WZW model in a nutshell
abstract: We give the bare-bone description of the quasitriangular chiral WZW model for the particular choice of the Lu-Weinstein-Soibelman Drinfeld double of the affine Kac-Moody group. The symplectic structure of the model and its Poisson-Lie symmetry are completely characterized by two $r$-matrices with spectral parameter. One of them is ordinary and trigonometric and characterizes the $q$-current algebra. The other is dynamical and elliptic (in fact Felder's one) and characterizes the braiding of $q$-primary fields.
